findings.title: Deployer can set max transaction limit with an indefinite amount
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to set a maximum transaction limit without any restrictions or bounds.

findings.title: Deployer can set and modify taxes/fees
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to set and modify taxes or fees, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can transfer ownership
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to transfer ownership of the contract.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The contract allows an unauthorized user to upgrade the script, potentially leading to malicious code execution.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The deployer can mint an unlimited number of tokens after initial deployment.
